TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET][COLOR_YELLOW]HELP: [COLOR_REVERT]Allows you to sacrifice human and Neanderthal captives for culture or happiness.
TEXT.French: vous permet de sacrifier les hommes et néanderthaliens pour de la culture ou du bonheur.
TEXT.Italian: Ti permette di sacrificare i prigionieri umani e Neanderthal per ottenere cultura o felicità.
TEXT.Polish: Pozwala na składanie ofiar z pojmanych jeńców.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Worldview - Human Sacrifice[COLOR_REVERT] indicates that sacrificing humans to the god(s) is OK in your nation at this time. It can only be removed by a Great Person or Lawyer.
TEXT.French: La [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Vision du monde - Sacrifices humaines[COLOR_REVERT] indique que la pratique des sacrifices humains pour les Dieux fait partie de votre culture. Elle peut uniquement être enlevée par un personnage illustre ou un avocat.
TEXT.German: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Worldview - Human Sacrifice[COLOR_REVERT] indicates sacrificing humans to the god(s) is OK in your nation at this time. It can only be removed by a Great Person or Lawyer.
TEXT.Italian: La [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Concezione del mondo - Sacrifici umani[COLOR_REVERT] indica che nella tua città è legale sacrificare agli dei altri individui. Può essere rimossa solo da un Grande personaggio o da un uomo di legge.
TEXT.Spanish: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Worldview - Human Sacrifice[COLOR_REVERT] indicates sacrificing humans to the god(s) is OK in your nation at this time. It can only be removed by a Great Person or Lawyer.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Altar for Human Sacrifice[COLOR_REVERT] increases returns from human sacrifice.
TEXT.French: L'[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Autel pour Sacrifice Humain[COLOR_REVERT] augmente les bénéfices du sacrifice humain.
